code: import{LOGIN_USER,REGISTER_USER}from'./types';import axios from'axios';export function registerUser(submitData){var request=axios.post('/register',submitData).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:REGISTER_USER,payload:request};}export function loginUser(submitData){var request=axios.post('/login',submitData).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:request};}
